title: Type Invaders
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001340/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001340/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Type Invaders**

Personal foundry of [Paul van der Laan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001340/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20van%20der%20Laan), based in The Hague, Netherlands.
